# findtb

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->


## Installation

You can install the development version of findtb from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("cynkra/findtb")
```

## findtb.data

Data for the project are stored in a directory called `findtb.data`. Please, set its path as an environment variable.

`FINDTB_DATADIR="~/path_to/findtb.data"`
